title: Falco Is a CNCF Graduate. Now What?
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Falco offers sensors across distributive architectures, and it's geared particularly for distributed architectures, notably Kubernetes, containers, etc.
cntitle: Falco 已成为 CNCF 毕业生。接下来呢？
cndescription: Falco 提供跨分布式架构的传感器，并且它特别适用于分布式架构，尤其是 Kubernetes、容器等。
